title: EmotionalPianoMusic1
longDescription:
🔗YoutubeDemo.

https://youtu.be/RIT1Cjz4wVY < Youtube Preview



📖Overview.

The Emotional Piano Music Pack is a high-quality collection of piano music suitable for use in games, movies, animations, dramas, and various other projects. This pack consists of 7 moving piano compositions, showcasing exceptional piano performances and emotionally captivating melodies. These music pieces are designed to evoke various emotions and moods, making them perfect for emotional scenes, romantic moments, and heartwarming storytelling. Listening to these tracks will leave audiences touched by their beautiful sentiment.



🕹️Functionality.


  • Emotional Piano Performances: The pack features exceptional piano performances by skilled pianists.
  • Expressive Emotions: The melodies express a range of emotions and moods, making them ideal for emotional scenes.
  • Versatile Use: Suitable for all types of projects, including games, movies, animations, dramas, and more.
  • Encompassing Beauty: The music adds a beautiful sentiment to your projects.



📂FILES. (TrackList)


  • Carousel of Memories
  • Forever Cherished Dream
  • Getting ready for a love confession
  • Just a Human Story
  • Keep smiling. You'll be the only flower in that land
  • The moment I want to go back to my childhood
  • Towards a steadfast tomorrow



⭐5STAR Review.


  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.



Note: A good understanding of Blueprints will help you use the project in a more effective manner, but it is not a requirement.
